about_the_game:
Campus Legends College Basketball is the ultimate college basketball management game, putting you in control of your favorite team or allowing you to build a dynasty from the ground up. Featuring 192 teams and thousands of players, you’ll immerse yourself in the intricacies of coaching, recruiting, and team management to achieve basketball glory.

Recruit Top Talent

Scout and recruit high school and transfer players from across the country. Engage in recruiting battles and secure the future stars of your team.

Level Up Your Coach

Earn experience points to enhance your coaching skills. Specialize in offense, defense, training, and recruiting to gain unique advantages and build your coaching legacy.

Comprehensive Stat Tracking

Track detailed statistics for every player and team.

National Tournament

Compete in a thrilling 64-team national tournament. Guide your team through the brackets, witness jaw-dropping upsets, and aim for the ultimate championship title.

Training

Develop your players throughout the season to fit your strategy. Manage your roster effectively to optimize performance.

Build Your Dynasty

Create a lasting legacy with your team. Achieve milestones, win championships, and establish your program as a powerhouse in college basketball.

name: Campus Legends College Basketball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 1.8GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT, AMD/ATI Mobility Raedon HD 3650 - 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Experience the ultimate college basketball management game. Take charge as a coach, recruit top talent, develop your team, and compete for national championships. Manage one of 192 teams, making strategic decisions to build your basketball dynasty
